title: Can't get champion with level 7
body:
I'm not sure what I'm missing here, it seems like I have all the requirements, but I can't get Braum to level 7 already
http://i68.tinypic.com/rmjxns.png

What's the problem?

replies.body:
It looks like *Zombiemaster* is spot on. You'll need gain 2 more tokens so you'll have a total of 3, before you can unlock mastery level 7.

Complete details on this system can be found on our [Champion Mastery Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide). Let me know if you have any questions.
Based on the picture, it seems that you only have 1 mastery 7 token for Braum.
